reviewText:
Not interesting.
Even if I had this game on my phone ---> https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.onemanbandgames.blowyfish
I still wouldn't play it. It's just not that amusing of an Angry Birds-esque game.

BTW, the game is 100% free for Android on Google Play linked above. I'm not sure why you would pay $2 for it here, when it is Free on Android. You can play on PC via an Android emulator if you really wanted.

reviewText: Angry Birds on Steroids !! A great mobile game, which for me ports really well to pc, with nice achievements, hats, beards, clothing ...  to boot !! The soundtrack was a supprisingly well put together from freely available elevator music. Picked this up in a bundle, but I wouldn't be upset if I had paid the non sale price.

reviewText:
Blowy Fish is a very simple, low cost, very funny the customizable skins.
I recommend it to those looking for something quick and not too challenging, also point out that the cards are easy to recover , and cost little.
(Below is the Italian full review)  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GohtjAvYsfs


Blowy Fish è un semplice platform arcade 2D, in cui impersoniamo un pesce palla.
Bisogna trovare la giusta angolazione, evitare i nemici, ed ogni livello ci saranno nuovi nemici ed ostacoli.

Riuscirai a superare tutti i 50 livelli? ottenendo il miglior punteggio?

Feature:
One-Click ovvero basta un solo cilick del mouse per giocare

Tantissimi ostacoli: nemici, piattaforme, bolle, meduse, correnti d'acqua etc.

Oltre 80 skin personalizzate

2 Modalità di gioco: la modalità beatable" a livelli
date:
e la modalità infinita


Parere personale:  Blowy Fish è un gioco molto semplice
hoursPlayed: molto divertenti le skin personalizzabili.\nLo consiglio a chi cerca qualcosa di veloce e non di troppo impegnativo

reviewText: Fun casual game, kind of like Angry Birds only underwater. Insanely addictive!

I literally forget the point of this game and I don't even care. Hit around a blowfish, get stars, and then play blowfish pachinko and decorate it with ridiculous outfits. 10/10 Best game of the year.\n\nWarning: Absolutely not for you if you hate death by mine, death by sea urchin, and restarting levels over and over and over and over.... If you'd like a random procedurally generated darksouls for clicker addicts with ridiculously cute graphics and music so bad it's good and Michael Bay explosions via blowfish and blowing up boxes that are literally filled with junk? Then you'll love this.

reviewText: Haven't played long, but this is unexpectedly fun...  Simple; pull fish tail and release to shoot fish forward, grab goodies, avoid baddies with a lot of achievements and extras to collect.     Not much else to say... good, casual game for a few minutes at a time...
voteText: 2 of 3 people (67%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: A surprisingly fun time waster, recommended at $2 or less.  Clearly designed for mobile, but I had no problems playing it with a mouse.  Gameplay is simple: you drag and launch a blowfish through an obstacle-filled cavern divided into stages.  Along the way, you may optionally collect stars.  100 stars earn you a try in the game's version of a pachinko machine, where depending where your fish lands you can earn silly outfits.  In a pleasant touch for the casual gamer, many common obstacles aren't lethal (urchins are, though).

reviewText: Very fun little game. I appreciate the creative effort that went into the comedy and (surprisingly) deep gameplay, in that you can use seaweed to hang from the ceiling for a better vantage point, among other things. That accompanied by the goofy music and sound effects make it well worth $2, though I'd probably have paid 5.
